channel.title: Blogs on Brandon Liang
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Brandon Liang

item.title: Co-op Quest: 2021
item.description: Northeastern has a co-op program where upperclassmen spend 4-8 months working full-time instead of taking classes for a semester, this is how it went during my sophomore year. Some people opt for one long co-op, some break it up into two (me), and some even three. I interned as a software engineer at MathWorks working on the MATLAB engine, followed by Microsoft working on the Azure cloud computing platform, respectively.

item.title: My First Post!
item.description: I decided to migrate from my old website to a blog on the Hugo engine, since I feel like writing to capture my unconventional college experience. My university friend Josh also gave me some great advice to change to a minimalistic website as I’d get tired of the design less easily.
